column4: What does this mean? ou just need to have mplayer, mencoder and ffmpeg binaries on your path (the more recent, the better)
if you install them they will automatically be put in the path
oki. thanks! how do i chack if i have them or not?
System> Admin> Synaptic Package manager and search for those names
is this the same as the add/remove menu ?
oki..  i can install the packages from here too?
and it is normal that i get a list of many things to install?
those are called dependancies.. in add/remove they just don't show them to you.
ok.. and if i search up the names i showed you in the first "post" and install them like this. Everything os ok?
yes.. search tag for install, search for the next, tag. etc.. and then click the apply button
is it ok to search up name, mark for installation, search up new name, mark, and press apply in the end?
yes.. that's what I was getting at in the last post.
